ExtendedSection.Title: Example with all variants of placing RDFA annotations

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
We show you an example that makes extensive use of the inline editing facilities. It is designed to provide you an overview on what is possible.

Do not make everything editable inline. The many edit buttons will lead to confusion. So choose carefully what should be editable via the inline editor, especially if it is not directly editable text. For a production website, the example has definitely too many edit points exposed in the inline editor!
